text.author: Claudio Pew, Savannah Eastler, Wisdom Fighters and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Create a Language
text.summary: This language creation guide excerpt suggests naming your language and possibly basing it on an existing language, starting with frequent, short function words, making grammar rules and affixes for gender, using non-Latin characters and punctuation, writing texts and teaching it to friends, as well as giving certain letters positive/negative connotations.
